center.p: S. 166To designate the new Interstate Route 70 bridge over the Mississippi River connecting St. Louis, Missouri and southwestern Illinois as the ‘Stan Musial Memorial Bridge’. 166

IN THE SENATHOUSE OF THE UNITED STATES
January 28, 2013Mrs. MCCASKILL (for herself, Mr. DURBIN, Mr. BLUNT, and Mr. KIRK) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and rREPRESENTATIVES

body.p:
Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works
A BILLTransportation and Infrastructure
To designate the new Interstate Route 70 bridge over the Mississippi River connecting St. Louis, Missouri and southwestern Illinois as the ‘Stan Musial Memorial Bridge’.

p.em: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

ul.p: (a) Designation- The new Interstate Route 70 bridge over the Mississippi River that connects St. Louis, Missouri to southwestern Illinois shall be known and designated as the ‘Stan Musial Memorial Bridge’.

(b) References- Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the bridge referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the ‘Stan Musial Memorial Bridge’.
